name: Ariadne Conill 🐰 (@ariadne@treehouse.systems)
summary:
[The CEO of Hashicorp speaks after the BSL shenanigans](https://www.thestack.technology/hashicorp-ceo-predicts-oss-free-silicon-valley-unless-the-open-source-model-evolves/):

> He claimed that “My phone started ringing materially after we made our announcement from every open source startup in Silicon Valley going ‘I think this is the right model’.”

I'll take "shit that definitely didn't happen" for $1,000
